name: MineSweeper for Android - Built on Android
name_original: MineSweeper for Android - Built on Android
description:
Classic Minesweeper
Built entirely and from scratch on an Android device.

Switch between 'Dig' mode and 'Flag' mode using the buttons bellow the mine field.

A personal project/challenge - Create a full Minesweeper game using only my phone.
Tools (Android apps) used: APDE, Pixly
